title: Stimulus triggered release of actives from composite microcapsules based on sporopollenin from Lycopodium clavatum
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10280-10289
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00236A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Muriel Lecoeuche, Josef Borovička, Amro K. F. Dyab, Vesselin N. Paunov
We have demonstrated three different types of stimulus triggered release of a model drug from sporopollenin from Lycopodium clavatum based on pH sensitive, thermosensitive and near infrared light-sensitive polymer composition.
